original_text: And the priest shall offer the burnt offering and the meat offering upon the altar: and the priest shall make an atonement for him, and he shall be clean.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 번제와 소제를 제단에 드려 그를 위하여 속죄할 것이라 그리하면 그가 정결하리라

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall offer the burnt offering
and the meat offering upon the altar:
and the priest shall make an atonement for him,
